result.title: Everest Group: Significant Management Actions Should Put A Floor Under Results
result.text: Everest Group faces ongoing legacy insurance issues, prompting major reserve builds and a strategic shift under new leadership. EG implemented a $1.2 billion adverse development cover and is exiting 40% of its insurance business, focusing on reinsurance and specialty lines. Despite insurance setbacks, EG's reinsurance unit remains strong, and its high-quality investment portfolio supports solid net investment income.
